Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: An octagonal silver plate decorated with archaic, ornamental symbols. Columns of strange symbols are carved on it. A sense of horror tingles your skin upon watching the plate. You realize something is really wrong.
An archaic silver plate with strange symbols carved on it. A sense of horror tingles your skin upon watching the plate. Something clearly tells you a closer look might be dangerous.
